attributes.action: Create more vegetarian and heathy options at sports stadia facilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The need for more vegetarian and heathy options at football and other sports venues across the country are becoming incresingly obvious. A great example of this is the new wembley stadium facilities which were widely critisised. Overpricing is also a big issue.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
